title: Tripwire
creator_credit: Valerie Morton, David Hirst and Australian Film Commission
brief_description: A character and action driven true-life adventure documentary looking at the Australian Armys secret Norforce unit that forms this Island continents first line of defence across the remote Kimberly region and the Northern Territory. Norforce is also one of the msot dynamic experiments in inter-racial relations as the unit is made up of both white and Aboriginal Australians where the soldiers learn essential survival skills from each other. Narrated by Archie Roach, and featuring the music of the Warumpi Band.
